Greetings to all, 

I have just added a long gendai katana by Kanetani Katsumasa to my web site. 
Also, the price on the NTHK papered Owari tsuba has been drastically reduced 
and a NTHK papered Shoami tsuba has been listed on eBay. Please take a look if 
you have any interest.
